MeetKale: ^<color=#ffffffff>A dark loner guy stands off to the side.
^<color=#ffffffff>If you weren't coming this way, you might have missed him.
^<color=#ffffffff>Approaching him, he seems to have noticed your pretense and quickly looks away.
^<color=#ffffffff>Is he... Trying to pretend you aren't here?
^<color=#ffffffff>The silence is apparent between you both, a battle between who will speak first.
^<color=#ffffffff>It's actually getting quite awkward, maybe it's time to go?
